metadata.title: CVE-2021-26948 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Null pointer dereference in the htmldoc v1.9.11 and before may allowattackers to execute arbitrary code and cause a denial of service via acrafted html file.

criterions.comment: htmldoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
